text: Hinnak Nabiyow A-korosuk Yallat agleytah haytaanamih qibaada tayse innaa, hinnay barrii kee baddi diteetak gita siinih yascasseeh, isi Racmatak (rob kinnuk) foocat aytikumah caacooya siinih ruuba Yalli yayseeh? Ah abeh yan Yall√¢ luk yaqbuden Yalli yanii? (mayan) Yalli fayya iyyeeh saytunnooweh agleh kaat hayya haanamak keenik ixxic
